summary: A top secret Agent is murdered, so his estranged son, a high school gymnast, teams up with his dad's attractive female partner to stop the psychopathic hermaphroditic gang leader who killed him, and now plans a major terrorist attack.
cast: John Stamos|Vanity|Gene Simmons|George Lazenby|Peter Kwong|Ed Brock|John Anderson|Robert Englund|Tara Buckman|Curtis Taylor|Jon Greene|Tim Colceri|John Miranda|Patrick Wright|Art Payton|Gary Kasper|Ivar Mireles|Randy Hall|Branscombe Richmond|Larry Leverett|Viva Sex
title: Nunca es pronto para morir
